data.actual_result: You cannot choose a channel after closing and reopening the selection menus a few times
data.expected_result: You should be able to choose a channel no matter how many times you open and close the menus
data.short_description: Selection menus for new member and AFK channels disappear after closing and reopening them a few times
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server you have the Manage Server permission for - Go to Server Settings > Overview - Open and close the selection menu for the new member or AFK channels without actually selecting anything - Notice that you are unable to choose any channels after repeating the action a few times
